title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element is not displaying the contents of the database field correctly.
EB: The dynamic text content type should be applied correctly and take effect as expected.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a database field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tag.
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tag.
   c) Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
